forum.content:
和我一起孤獨地醒來
Wake up lonely with you by my side               
一個晚上，沒有感覺
One more night, it doesn't feel

有電影在你的眼睛打轉
There are movies playing in your eyes

你的夢想我們的命運
You dream of our fortunes

但是你錯了
But you're wrong
我不屬於你
I don't belong to you

月亮是我外面唯一的朋友
The moon is the only friend I have outside

再喝一杯，我會得到治癒
One more drink and I'll be healed

我告訴你的話，然後知道這是一個謊言
I told you the words and then knew it was a lie

我希望我能提供的上訴
I wish I could offer an appeal

你錯了
You're wrong
我不屬於
I don't belong
你錯了
You're wrong
我不屬於你
I don't belong to you

為什麼我會給
What I'd give for that
第一天晚上，當你是我，你是我的
First night when you were mine, you were mine

試著用我所有的
Tried with all that I have
讓你活著，活著
To keep you alive, alive

我沒有教過這種方式
I wasn't taught this way

萬千話要說
With a thousand things to say

我出生在一個破碎的心臟
I was born with a broken heart

為什麼我會給
What I'd give for that

第一天晚上，當你是我的
First night when you were mine

還以為你是我的
Thought you were mine

所以我把這支煙放在床上
So I'll put this cigarette to bed

從你身邊拉一些床單
Pull some sheets from off your side

我把我的手臂安在夜裡
I put my arm around you safe in the night

還在夢想著財富
Still dreaming of fortune

但是你錯了
But you're wrong
我不屬於
I don't belong
你錯了
You're wrong
我不屬於
I don't belong
你錯了
You're wrong
我不屬於
I don't belong
我不屬於
I don't belong
我不屬於
I don't belong

urls.description: Cary Brother's song "Belong" from his new album "Under Control" | Copyright © 2010 Procrastination L
urls.title: Cary Brothers - Belong

forum.title: Belong-CARY BROTHERS
